string.name: name
string.value: Dual Blade: The Seal of Destiny
An owl randomly appeared with a letter written to you by an unidentified person.

An owl randomly appeared with a letter written to you by an unidentified person... The content of the letter was short and included a warning to never stray from the path of a Dual Blade... Who could have sent this letter? The letter continues by saying that the writer will contact you again when you reach #e#bLv. 9#k#n.

#b- To #h0# -
'Muahaha...#h0#...How are you? I hope this letter finds you well and faithful on the path of a #eDual Blade#n... Soon, we shall meet again. I will contact you again when you reach Lv. 9. How shall I get in touch with you? Don't worry, we're watching you closely... Muahaha.'
- From Your Secret Watchman -

- From Your Secret Watchman -

string.value:
EXP 10
#Wbasic#
#i1003075:# #t1003075:# 1 
Can proceed to 'First Mission: Infiltration' quest.

#bReceiver: #h0#
Sender: ...#k

Do you wish to open the letter?

#b- To #e#h0##n -\r\n'Muahaha...#h0#...How are you? I hope this letter finds you well and faithful on the path of a #eDual Blade#n... Soon, we shall meet again. I will contact you again when you reach #eLv. 9#n. How shall I get in touch with you? Don't worry, we're watching you closely... Muahaha.'\r\n- From Your Secret Watchman -
You placed the letter in your pocket.
